text: Woh din jabke aasman ko hum yun lapeit kar rakh denge jaise tumar mein awraaq lapeit diye jatey hain (leaves of paper are rolled up in a written scroll) jis tarah pehle humne takhleeq ki ibtida ki thi usi tarah hum phir uska iaada (originate) karenge. Yeh ek wada hai hamare zimme, aur yeh kaam humein bahr-haal karna hai
